verses:
Jesus, my Lord, 
will love me forever;
From Him no pow’r
of evil can sever.
He gave His life
to ransom my soul;
Now I belong to Him.

Once I was lost in sin’s degradation.
Jesus came down to bring me salvation,
Lifted my up from sorrow and shame.
Now I belong to Him.
chorus:
Now I belong to Jesus,
 Jesus belongsto me
Not for the years of time alone,
But for eternity.
